/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The buildings, painted in hues of red and white, stand tall and proud, their facades adorned with vibrant graffiti that adds a touch of urban artistry to the cityscape. The street below is a hive of activity, with cars and pedestrians going about their day, adding life and movement to the scene. The sun shines brightly in the background, casting a warm glow over the city and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
